Clue_Spoon.label: Spoon
Clue_Spoon.memoryLine: Stirring… again and again. Someone depended on the rhythm.

Clue_ChefsKnife.label: Chef's Knife
Clue_ChefsKnife.memoryLine: My hand knew exactly where to go. One slip and it’s red.

Clue_Basket.label: Wicker Basket
Clue_Basket.memoryLine: Weight on my arm. Coins. Familiar faces pretending not to look.

Clue_Keyring.label: Keyring
Clue_Keyring.memoryLine: Doors. Rules. The feeling of being trusted… or trapped.

Clue_Ticket.label: Ticket Stub
Clue_Ticket.memoryLine: Time printed in ink. Leaving before someone could stop me.

Clue_Armband.label: Stitched Armband
Clue_Armband.memoryLine: Bandages. Breathing. Counting… don’t stop counting.

Clue_Goggles.label: Workshop Goggles
Clue_Goggles.memoryLine: Hot metal. The smell that sticks in your hair.

Clue_Notebook.label: Burnt Notebook
Clue_Notebook.memoryLine: My words survived the fire. That feels… unfair.

Clue_Badge.label: Scratched Badge
Clue_Badge.memoryLine: A name I hated. A job I did anyway.

Clue_Map.label: Folded Map
Clue_Map.memoryLine: Routes. Shortcuts. The pen marks weren’t for sightseeing.

Clue_Locket.label: Empty Locket
Clue_Locket.memoryLine: There was a face here. Why would I remove it?

Clue_Trowel.label: Garden Trowel
Clue_Trowel.memoryLine: Dirt under nails. Planting… or hiding.
